titles.title: A bill to establish a pilot program under which the Chief of the Forest Service may use alternative dispute resolution in lieu of judicial review for certain projects.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Protect Collaboration for Healthier Forests Act
This bill directs the Forest Service to establish an arbitration pilot program as an alternative dispute resolution process in lieu of judicial review for the arbitration of projects in Idaho, Montana, or Wyoming that
are developed through a collaborative process, are carried out under the Collaborative Forest Landscape Restoration Program, or are identified in a community wildfire protection plan; have as a purpose hazardous fuels reduction or mitigation of insect or disease infestation; and are located in a wildland-urban interface.
